front.title: An LDAP Schema for Phone Books

abstract.t: This document describes an LDAP schema for the attributes to be included in the standard phone book. Goals of this document include: - Creating a flexible, extensible and robust framework upon which to build a standard phone book - Promoting a standard phone book format, to enhance interoperability between ISPs and roaming consortia Non-goals of this document include: - Attempting to create a ''Swiss army knife'', with phone book attributes to please everyone on Earth - Definition of either server-server or client-server phone book update or transfer protocols
